description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Christmas Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 170Â°C. Line a 12hole muffin pan with paper cases.
Beat butter, sugar and orange rind in a bowl until pale and creamy. Gradually add egg, beating well after each addition.

Stir in fruit, almond and orange juice. Sift together flours and spice and fold into mixture. Divide between muffin holes and smooth tops. Bake for 30 minutes or until firm to touch. Set aside to cool.
To decorate, colour icing if desired. Roll out until 3mm thick. Use cutters to cut out shapes and place on top of cakes.
